title: Calories in McD Hamburger
meta_description: Discover calories in mcd hamburger, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and quick variations for your meal planning.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's hamburger: regular bun, beef patty, ketchup, mustard, onions, pickles; no cheese or extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and preparation; check McDonald's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One McDonald's hamburger provides ~250 kcal and ~12 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one mcd hamburger?
faqs.a: Approximately 250 kcal for a standard McDonald's hamburger.

faqs.q: What is the protein in mcd hamburger?
faqs.a: About 12 g of protein per hamburger.

faqs.q: How much sodium in calories in mcd hamburger?
faqs.a: Around 510 mg sodium, mainly from the bun and condiments.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in mcd hamburger?
faqs.a: Yes, ~31 g carbs, mostly from the bun, with 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does mcd hamburger have trans fat?
faqs.a: About 1.5 g trans fat per hamburger; McDonald's has reduced but not eliminated it.
